original_text: But unto the sons of Kohath he gave none: because the service of the sanctuary belonging unto them was that they should bear upon their shoulders.
korean_text: 고핫 자손에게는 주지 아니하였으니 그들의 성소의 직임은 그 어깨로 메는 일을 하는 까닭이었더라

sentences.original_text: But unto the sons of Kohath he gave none
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 고핫의 아들들에게는 아무것도 주지 않았으니

sentences.original_text: because the service of the sanctuary belonging unto them
was that they should bear upon their shoulders
